content: > cozy up with these fun foot warmers with our step-by-step instructions you ll be a pro in no time **summary** basic crocheted sock - top-down heel flap/gusset construction **skill level ** intermediate **finished measurements ** - 9 5 foot to cuff - 7 7 75 8 75 9 5 10 25 **yarn requirements** additional yarn may be required for feet larger than women s size us9 pattern was featured on knit & crochet today show 103 socks
